title: Responsible for the technical development of Communications
details:
Responsible for the technical development of EMPRO, a SCADA system for the monitoring and control of photovoltaic parks.

Coordinate and lead the development team from a technical point of view

Implement part of the systems that make up EMPRO

Plan the design, development and implementation of new parts of the system

Deployment of the system in photovoltaic parks

title: Computer Engineer
details: Analysis of data collected by the SCADA system for photovoltaic plants using techniques close to Big Data. Create an autonomous system to generate temporary reports that help to understand the sharing of the plant and the failures that can occur in it.

title: Software Developer
details: Practices developing web utilities for internal use, with the aim of improving the productivity of the company. Most of the projects were developed in HTML, CSS and JS, supported by Backbone.JS and Materialize libraries.

title: SCADA Engineer
details: Design and implementation of data acquisition system for real time SCADA system. The project involves collecting data from different systems on a solar power plant and then put it in a database. Data acquisition part was developed in C ++ using libmodbus. In addition, we implemented a NodeJS server to facilitate data insertion.
